MONTGOMERY, Ala. NAACP
officials have protested the
bombing of the home of Negro
businessman and his family and
have requested a full investi-
cation by local police and the
FBI. 9


On ov.29, shortly before mid
night, the $4,000 home of MIR.
and Mrs. Charles Spears was
rocked by dynamite blast which
severely damaged their automo-
bile parked in the carport. All
the windows of the entire front
of the he house we're shattered.


If 1t had not been for the fact
that the car received the full
impact of the explosion, the bed
room directly over the carport
would have been severely
dana ged.

NAACP PROTESTS BOMBING OF


NEGRO HOME IN ALABAMA

MIR. Spears, who is jewelry
salesman, said IL have no af-
filiation with any organization
concerned with racial issues. Al
though plan to join the NAACP,
had not gotten around to it."


Their neighbors, MIR. and Mrs.
Chris Walker, reported they had
seen cars circling the neighbor-
hood watching the Spears house
off and on all summer. On the
Friday before Thanksgiving two
cars passed back and forth in
front Of their home several times.


Mrs. Walker stated that pos
sible explanation for the dyna-
hitting was because the Spears
had been eating at various
restaurants which had recently
been integrated.

= A sanity hearing for Lucille
Ann Williams, FL, 1901 S. Ninth
Ave., has been scheduled. She
pleaded innocent to second de-
gree murder charges. Her trial
has been set for Dec. 28 II she
is found legally sane.


Mrs. Williams repeatedly shot

Asa Scott, Jr. Is, four times Oct.
II in Dixon S Bar, l3l9W. Buck
eve. She told officers that Scott
beat and kicked her half sister,
Letha, his common law wife, dur
ing an argument at the bar.


The victim was dead on arrival
at the hospital.

School officials on the
campus of an Ell Cajon,
Calf, junior college banned
bare feet, tattered sweat
shirts, shorts, T-shirts, flop
py shoes and similar attire.

lovely glow radiates circle Of soft light
that only gaslight can give creates a
charming beacon for your home. 1t elirni-
mates dark shadowy places around your
home, and shines a gracious welcome to
family and friends.

of styles to match the grace Of your home
:. both post mounted and wall mounted,
